title: Rav Yosef Criticizes Chabad Custom
body: Sephardic Chief Rabbi Rav Yitzchak Yosef sharply criticized Chabad's practice of having every girl and woman light Shabbos candles with a brachah, calling it a new trend that evokes strong emotions in new brides.

title: Shalom Bayis Summit
body: The Agudah National Action Summit in Newark, NJ, on Dec 2, 2025, will feature a Rabbonim Session on Shalom Bayis and family alienation, focusing on conflict resolution through hashkafah and halacha.

title: Bismuth Backs Yeshiva Exemptions
body: Knesset chairman Boaz Bismuth confirms the government's revised draft bill will exempt full-time yeshiva students, while introducing a gradual framework to draft some chareidi public members not actively in yeshiva.
